name: XIIth Century Vaucluse Abbey
description:
DESCRIPTION
In the middle of the fields and vineyards of the Vaucluse hinterland (84), the Abbey invites you to host your event within its beautiful domain. This historic place opens its doors to you so that you can experience your festivities in a dream setting. You can enjoy two reception rooms as well as their two hectares of surrounding green spaces to organize your wedding.
Specialized in catering and the organization of major events, the Abbaye will receive your reception and welcome you in its magnificent setting , in the heart of the Luberon. These are exceptional services that await you to experience the high-end event you have always dreamed of. How about arriving by helicopter, for example? It is precisely possible thanks to partners and a reserved space to make your arrival detonating in the eyes of your guests!
With the modernity of the proposed services, the charming historical monument of the XIIth century which you will invest offers you two vaulted rooms covering a total area of 300 m2. You will have the possibility to receive up to 230 people . The bay window gives a space and a shaded courtyard whose view will amaze the least of your guests. The Abbey has a large car park with a capacity of 200 cars. This car park overlooks the abbey hidden by a wall of green laurels. The Abbey also has a helipad so it is possible to come by helicopter.
The XIIth Century Vaucluse Abbey team, which is a family business, will surprise you with its exceptional dynamism. They are event professionals who will offer you handpicked partners : caterers, decorators, photographers or even videographers… In short, they will simplify your life to make your wedding the event of a lifetime!
This exceptional setting offers a magnificent lawn to be able to organize a cocktail under the Provence sun. You can enjoy the more than pleasant temperature of this beautiful region of the Luberon. The dinner is generally organized in the Maurice room which can accommodate up to 180 seats. In addition, on the covered space outside it is possible to install 50 other people. It is also possible to organize dinner in the cherry blossom field around the Abbey . But still this area offers a courtyard on the site of the old cloister, it is then possible to dine in this courtyard.
The Abbaye can welcome you on Saturdays but also during the week to celebrate your wedding. It is also possible to book the next day to celebrate a brunch with your loved ones and make happiness last in the heart of the Luberon.
We are three minutes by car from the beautiful village, where you will find gites and guest rooms to accommodate your guests. A list of the nearest accommodation will be given to you during your reservation to facilitate your research. Our establishment offers two options:
-The rental of the Cabin on the green space, facing the nave of the Abbey. It is a two-room apartment with 1 double bed and 2 single beds, a bathroom and a separate toilet, furnished with a fridge and a microwave. Note that this space can be dedicated to children and their sitters: 500 € TTC
You also have an optional apartment for 4 people 350 € T.T.C
-The abbey cellar, to drop off or have your bottles delivered 3 or 4 days before your reception. This cellar is located next to the caterer's kitchen and the door is secure: 150 € TTC Otherwise the delivery of your spirits and wines will be when your rental begins.
Contact the owners of The XIIth Century Vaucluse Abbey for more information and become the next lucky couple to be able to organize your D-Day in this splendid domain .
